author: dkhaywood
msg: Added adapter facet factories for each of the value adapters, rather than explicitly registering (via setupAdaptersEtc in JavaIntrospector).  Probs with BooleanAdapter (NPE), so temporarily disabled.  ALSO: should actually be able to dogfood all of these or at least the NOF-specific ones, using @Parseable abnotation etc (cf the old @Value annotation).

author: dkhaywood
msg: In process of adding facet factories for Rob's value adapter stuff ... now compiling.  Basically have moved FacetFactory from nof-reflector-java into noa-architecture in order that nof-reflector-core (which is where BooleanAdapter lives) can hook in to this infrastructure.
